attributes.background: Aymen has very strong Dyslexia. Sign the Petition to help him

rejection.details:
This isn't something that a petition could help you with. You can find information about services for people with dyslexia here:

http://www.nhs.uk/Conditions/Dyslexia/Pages/Introduction.aspx

If you'd like the Government or Parliament to take a specific action to help people with dyslexia, you could start a new petition about that.
